metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3199 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Frames in Google Chrome prior to 105.0.5195.125 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
